attributes.action: give the billions of pounds of our money to those with morgage arrears
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why give all that money to lazy fatcats who have messed up the good work you did over ten years?. Pay off the morgages of those who were obviously missold their morgage's that would release vast amounts of cash into the open market as against the bankers who are hoarding it and causing even more problems The conditions on such a payoff would be that the homeowner could not sell or put a 2nd charge on the property for at least 5 years.
